channel.title: CVE Feed for ICS-CERT -- DeltaV
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ICS-CERT -- DeltaV

item.title: CVE-2018-14795|2024-08-05T09:38:13.958Z -- ics-cert -- deltav
item.description: DeltaV Versions 11.3.1, 12.3.1, 13.3.0, 13.3.1, and R5 is vulnerable due to improper path validation which may allow an attacker to replace executable files.

item.title: CVE-2018-14793|2024-08-05T09:38:14.040Z -- ics-cert -- deltav
item.description: DeltaV Versions 11.3.1, 12.3.1, 13.3.0, 13.3.1, and R5 is vulnerable to a buffer overflow exploit through an open communication port to allow arbitrary code execution.
